resources.string: No network connection detected. Check your network settings.

Welcome to Riple. Start by making a nice gesture to your friends and family then watch the riple spread. If you receive and accept a riple from a friend, do your part and pay it forward to three others. Remember, the smallest drop can create a riple. It\'s your world, make it different.
“I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the waters to create many ripples.”
